title: Early Breakouts & Sleepers + The Panderbear: LIVE in Detroit - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/21
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason give their early breakout & sleeper picks! Plus, restaurant to fantasy football player comps, audience questions answered live and more! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. Recorded Live at El Club in Detroit, Michigan -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 21st, 2022

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(02:00) - Player/Restaurant Comparisons
(10:10) - NFL News
(17:50) - Fantasy Football Breakouts
(18:15) - D’Andre Swift
(25:30) - A.J. Dillon
(30:30) - Miles Sanders
(36:05) - Fantasy Football Sleepers
(36:15) - David Bell
(42:50) - Brandon Aiyuk
(47:05) - Allen Lazard
(53:30) - Mailbag

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
